img_above_text:
![Wukong YellowFlower 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_YellowFlower_21.jpg)
As mentioned previously, the Commander Beetle can also perform of series of sword slams with his bigger left sword. The small line that extends from his strike won't look like much for a moment, until a large fissure erupts from the path of his weapon which he can do several times in a row.
img_below_text:
Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times.
![Wukong YellowFlower 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_YellowFlower_18.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 5 from the file 'Commander_Beetle.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong YellowFlower 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/92/Wukong_YellowFlower_21.jpg)
As mentioned previously, the Commander Beetle can also perform of series of sword slams with his bigger left sword. The small line that extends from his strike won't look like much for a moment, until a large fissure erupts from the path of his weapon which he can do several times in a row."
            - Following Text: "Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times.
![Wukong YellowFlower 18.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_YellowFlower_18.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring a battle against the Commander Beetle. The Commander Beetle is shown executing a powerful sword slam, generating a bright, slicing wave of force that cuts through the air and ground. This visual highlights the beetle's ability to perform devastating attacks both up close and from a distance, emphasizing the challenge players face when confronting this formidable enemy.
